website_summaries.verdict: A display case that won't take up precious floor space in your home. Mounts directly to the wall so you can display it at any height.
pros: Small presence on the wall preserves plenty of room for other wall hangings and art
cons: Case requires extra fastening and support for security

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: The looks of the cabinet is nice. There is a spot on the back mirror which is noticeable like there was a label with glue that was peeled off. I tried glass cleaner, alcohol & ammonia but nothing removes it.. I also don't like the doors not coming together when closed. Kinda defeats the purpose of having an enclosed cabinet to minimize dust. My husband threw the return slip out so I'm stuck with it, plus he put 2 LED lights on the top which really shows up my Swarovski collection which is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Hackling

customer_reviews.title: Second damaged item
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized cabinet, and is attractive as well, for a reasonable price. This is the second one I have received in the same damaged condition. Each one had the bottom shelf of the cabinet broken across the width. This appears to be a packaging or handling problem. It it was intact, I would give it a 5 rating. As it stands, I now think that any additional returns would arrive in the same condition. I will do my best to repair this and see how that goes. Too bad, it's a nice little cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in all the maintenance I had to do on ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this curio cabinet as a Christmas present. Upon arrival the bottom base was broke off. I though, “oh no big deal, I can just get some wood glue and fix that.” So I glued that piece back, hung it on the wall and guess what!? The left door was just barely hanging on because the top wasn’t secure either. Not worth 130$ if you ask me. I was very disappointed in all the maintenance I had to do on it. If I ever get it hung up, I’ll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total lack of workmanship - doors, finish
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably poor workmanship. Where front doors meet there was a gap between them varying from 3/8" to 1/2" top to bottom. Edge of door on one side was not flush from bottom to top. Stain was very uneven over all surfaces. Finish varnish was very rough (did they sand it at all?) on all surfaces. This was one crappy piece of furniture. Amazon let me return it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, perfect for my desk and pens, inks, and books. I really wouldn't change anything
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for to keep fragile keepsakes. Perfect. So perfect, I ordered another one. The shelving offers options for height, mirror back is nice, the only con is the gap between the doors. Doesn’t really keep the dust out. Other than that, very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Royal

customer_reviews.title: Builder needs to learn to measure
customer_reviews.text: The first cabinet i ordered was fine, but this second one (like other reviewers have mentioned) has about a 1/4” gap between the doors! It’s too much trouble to try to exchange it, and even if idid, the replacement might be just as bad, or worse. The video showing German craftsmen working carefully and expertly on these cabinets is totally bogus; they have a “made in China” sticker on the box. Figures Update: if you replace the plastic shelf supports with the 1/4” metal supports with rubber tips (sold by amazon), the shelves fit mire snugly and don’t slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Linda  Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged well.....glass and mirror broke when opening box
customer_reviews.text: This was not packaged well at all. When opening it out of box, I heard something slide and crash, and yes, it was the glass and mirror that broke.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Well, I'm here with many now
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and was packaged great. No damage could have happened to it in the shipping. BUT, I get it out of the box and the whole right front corner had a deep crack running about 3 inches. I looked at the rest and saw several nicks. Countersunk screws had no covering over them. I could do a better job making this item. They put this into the packaging damaged! That sucks. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then you think.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very small. Way smaller than I anticipated. The craftsmanship is just OK. The glass had paint streaks which I had to clean off. The packaging was good. I wanted to just sit it on the floor but it is designed to hang on the wall. I wanted to put my shot glass collection in it but they won't fit because I have too many and they are various sizes. Before buying this product be sure to confirm your measurements and be aware this item does not qualify for any returns by Amazon 😕
customer_reviews.author: Darrell G.

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and prepared to be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was exactly what I wanted. Right size, 3 adjustable shelves that were the right depth. However, many of the reviews were less than stellar. Quality appeared a real issue but there were few other options. This cabinet had the best look and price. I decided to buy the cabinet, prepared to fix whatever was wrong. Cabinet arrived in a few days. The cabinet was exactly what I hoped for. Well packaged, no damage , no wonky door alignment and nicely painted. Based on all the reviews I cannot say all will arrive this way, but I hope it starts a positive trend.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Could use more quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly, in good condition. However, at $150 I guess I was expecting more quality than I got. The design of this product is better than the execution. The wood used in this display case has not been well sanded, the finish is uneven with several places missing finish. The wood strips used to hold in the glass panels is unfinished and visible from outside the case. The doors in the front do not meet in the middle, there is a 1/4 to 1/2" gap with the doors closed. With just a little more attention to detail this could be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL BUYING RETURNS !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I should have know buying a returned Item 111 , It wasn't packed well and the bottom shelf was split and it was unattached from Sides . Otherwise its a real nice unit except for the fact that the doors do not meet at all . There is a significant gap - I'd say 3/8" .. It could have easily been avoided by adding a overlap strip behind one door Or using better hinges . Otherwise real nice stain ... Could easily have been twice the price if better built.
customer_reviews.author: j1ceasar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother since she entered an assisted living community and her original curio cabinet was too large to follow her in the facility. She missed her original curio cabinet so much and had put away all her most precious collectibles because she had no room to display them without it looking like clutter. When she received it, she immediately had it put up on one of her walls and enjoyed unpacking all that brings her good memories to look at. The quality is excellent, the spacing between shelves allows her to display higher items and she just loves it. Don't hesitate, because it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C-C

customer_reviews.title: One star is one star too many
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cabinet to display a memorial for our deceased kitty, Susie (Urn, her favorite toys, blanket......) Once I got the item out of the non-damaged shipping box and on our kitchen table, I saw what I thought was a non stained piece of wood across the bottom (front). Wrong, a strip of wood was broken off from one end to the other. Upon closer examination I found a number of other issues with this cabinet. If you are looking to throw away money, I suggest buying this item. Tried to add a pic, but it wouldn't let me.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pease

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful show cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Decided to start a collection of bird figurines from our area.I began to look at cabinets and they got very expensive.This was a fair price and is perfect for my use.Its put together nicely.We will really enjoy our collection with the cabinet adding to the collection.Arrived quickly as usual from Amazon and was up in a flash.My only complaint was it was packed with Styrofoam which I like to see less of and little flakes of it were all over the cabinet.We had to vacuum them due to the static.
customer_reviews.author: WOODY

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality - if you buy it open it immediately to inspect
customer_reviews.text: The bottom piece of wood was broken off and unfortunately I had to wait to open the box and by the time I did it was too late to return it. From all the reviews and my experience it may not be worth the risk buying this cabinet but if you do buy it, open it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Merrill

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the quality of this curio. There are some small scratches on the front, and the stain was not applied well. There are noticeable splotches. Let me say I'd also like to throttle people who put stickers on glass shelves that have to be cleaned off with goo be gone. I was expecting better craftsmanship for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a quality product to display your ...
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a quality product to display your collectables, this may not be what you want. front doors have a 3/8 inch gap,( WILL NOT KEEP THE DUST OUT) I still bought this after reading reviews, to hold some items till I found what I was looking for. It is way over priced for the overall Quality. I give the maker A for concept, F for Quality control and material choice and construction (hinges have way to much acces play, will need to replace them just to make sure doors dont fall off). If I where Amazon this product would be dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this curio cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet should be rated zero stars! It is very poorly made and I made the mistake of returning the first cabinet hoping for something better the second time. Nope! The doors were falling off both cabinets, they were poorly finished, and covered in chips and dents. My daughter was very disappointed... twice!
customer_reviews.author: John F. Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Just so so!
customer_reviews.text: I love Design Toscano so have to say I'm a bit disappointed by this item. There is a large gap between the two doors and also at the top and bottom of each door. I'm more into eclectic style so I don't plan on returning this but if you are looking for a curio cabinet that is all buttoned up you may want to look further. As always with this company the packing is excellent! Never a worry there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst expiruence ever
customer_reviews.text: It was sent first time, but we did’t get. Second time was broken.
customer_reviews.author: achemanagua

customer_reviews.title: Pos.got ran over by a truck.  :(
customer_reviews.text: Well this thing looks like it got ran over by a truck the poor thing Is in four(4) peaces wow I have shopping here for 3 years here man I can't be leave the driver could not see the big holes in the boxes it's be on fixing so now what I have a box full of broken glass and wood and no display Tried to call some one they are gone that suck and now I an out 150,00,,, merry Christmas
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet arrived well packaged and already assembled. The interior glass shelving was well wrapped and required installation, which was a breeze. The shelves are adjustable so we were able to place them where we needed them. The cabinet mounted easily. There are two hooks on the back of the unit and we used 50lb picture hooks to secure it to the wall. The doors shut tightly but aren't so difficult to open that the whole cabinet rattles with the latch releases. The craftsmanship is nice with all the seams/edges lining up evenly and should be a nice display cabinet for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: KiwiGirl

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed and packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet arrived broken. Poorly constructed and packaged. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sinless Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much when I got the first one that I ordered another to hold some of our souvenirs from trips. Loved the fact that it was packed so well that none of the glass panels or shelves were damaged at all. Lots of flexibility for shelf placement - I actually just put a few shelves I'm not currently using on top of the cabinets for storage. Good quality, nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Andree

customer_reviews.title: This product was reasonably priced and was perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for an attractive display case of this size for some time. Most of the one's I found were either way too expensive or looked cheap. This product was reasonably priced and was perfect for me. I have a collection of jeweled eggs that looks great in this display case. I added a stick on LED light on top and bottom and it looks beautiful. The case was received in a timely manner and was appropriately packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Irene M

customer_reviews.title: It was a good cabinet for the money perfect size for a small space
customer_reviews.text: It was a good cabinet for the money perfect size for a small space
customer_reviews.author: shellee woolf

customer_reviews.title: You can tell that these were built with love!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful small cabinet! I wish that I could get this exact same model in a full floor unit. In order to do that you can buy two of these and stack them. I love them just the way they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Good looking piece, a little fragile, but if you're not constantly moving it it works great
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wall curio
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is lovely and was the wood color I expected. I was a bit disappointed by the fact that when the backing was attached to the unit, the nails used did not match up with the base and ended up being exposed on the underside of the cabinet. Since it is a wall-hung unit, those nails did show. We ended up removing the nails, pounded them back in in the proper location, and did a bit of repair work. -- While a lovely piece, a bit more attention to detail would have been appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: not what I was expecting. The glass dividers did ...
customer_reviews.text: not what I was expecting. The glass dividers did not fit properly. My husband had to modify the screws to place glass dividers in order for them to fit. you can tell that the wood is unfinished. We also had to go to Home Depot and get screws to attach cabinet to the wall. The screws that came with order did not seemed strong enough. Overall the cabinet looks unfinished. If you want for your display cabinet to be on point then don't purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisandra Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Too small and way over priced
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this shrine for my deceased loved one, it is a joke. Not worth the time sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers said, it is not fine furniture; however, it matched the finish of the furniture in the area where I wanted to hang it and it was the purfect size for the contents I wanted to display. It is sturdy enough and met my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For her Precious Moments collection!
customer_reviews.text: This curio cabinet is beautiful and just the right size for a small area or the wall. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter who was eleven for the birthday year's Precious Moment collection she had/has. She is twelve years old right now. It came on time for Christmas and it was all in one piece and now is in her bedroom. Oh, and I thought it was very nicely priced too.
customer_reviews.author: dottybgood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice curio have in my bedroom looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curio very nice !! One thing I wish it was still at the price I bought it before! paid a lot less than $140's. If it would go down for me I would buy another one!!
customer_reviews.author: angie paul

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The only mistake I made was in trying to hang the cabinet on the wall myself. My husband had to correct my mistake! It is gorgeous and I love displaying my great grandmother's tea cup and matching plates.
customer_reviews.author: Hadassah

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, Terrible No-Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with packaging undamaged. The actual product has a door broken off into 3 pieces, two glass panels were loose in the box (broken free), one glass broken in half. The wood trim that held the glass in was broken off (one piece missing). The pegs that hold the glass shelves in place were not included. The wood is chipped up from the broken pieces banging around. Basically I ordered a curio and received some scrap pieces of wood and some broken glass in a box. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: StockingWaifu

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than it is
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet looked great in the photo. the doors do not match up level at the top, I did brace the back to straighten it up. The finish is very rough it actually snags the dust clothes when I clean it. I would not recommend anyone purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Collector with out a good place to house my collection.

customer_reviews.title: ... box around the smaller one inside and appears in good condition. We have not removed it completely from ...
customer_reviews.text: The package came carefully packed with a larger outer box around the smaller one inside and appears in good condition. We have not removed it completely from the box. The glass shelves slide inside and we didn't want to chance breaking anything before it was placed it in my daughter's room. She has collections that she wants to keep safe and this appears to be the right size and is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Using ours to create a "memory box" for our pets that have passed on. Trinkets and their ash containers fit nicely. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. The mounting hardware needs strengthening.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty piece and does just what I want it to. It's relatively heavy, especially with the glass shelves and mirror. The tiny screws attaching the hanging brackets seemed inadequate to safely support the cabinet once it was loaded with decorations. I discarded them, drilled the holes larger and installed longer, thicker screws. Apart from that, it looks great on my wall and nicely displays the pieces for which I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jaxers

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the little curio
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the little curio. . .not fine furniture but meets the need and works for small collectibles. I have it sitting on a credenza - don't recommend hanging it on the wall as in the photo as it not a solid piece of furniture. The glass shelves are nice and heavy (thick).
customer_reviews.author: Michael SKOOG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wall Curio Cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: The first curio cabinet we received had a cracked mirror. I immediately reported this and a second one was sent as soon as I reported the cracked mirror. It is beautiful and I am so glad I have this to display my tea sets.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice display case for challenge coins
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with damage to the box but no damage to the product. The product has obvious wood filler that you can see through the stain. You can see a couple wood joints that still had glue that was stained over instead of removed. The glass was free of scratches or marks and the doors operate fine. All in all it works
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful "treasure" cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very happy with my new curio cabinet! I have been looking for a simple style like this one and it is perfect. The glass shelves are nice too and show off my "treasures" beautifully. I would certainly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacques W. Vanveen

customer_reviews.title: The wall curio is built ok the problem that we ...
customer_reviews.text: The wall curio is built ok the problem that we had was the glass shelves would not stay on the round pegs if you just touch the shelves they would fall off. We contacted the seller and in turn they were going to look into the problem, we have not heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The outside finish was not perfect and there a couple nicks along the edges.
customer_reviews.author: L K Kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, Serves the propose for showing some items
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful On My Wall
customer_reviews.text: I've been collecting nesting dolls for some time, now. This is my first wall curio for them, and I couldn't be happier. It's attractive and has a very nice finish. It was very well packed for shipping and I didn't find any flaws or imperfections in the glass or the wood. The glass shelves are adjustable by fixed-position pegs. It's very attractive in the family room and I plan to add more of these are my collection of dolls grows.
customer_reviews.author: Elihu

customer_reviews.title: Well-made cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband to display some of his war trophys. He loved it. It's very solid and sturdy. It was easy for him to install to the wall. The package was huge when it came, but it was very well protected. Nothing was damaged during shipping/delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Great buy & just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Priced right, delivered fast & arrived in great condition! My surprise was the mirror in back, which sure sets off the collectables inside. Looked around before purchased this one & have no regrets on my decision to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: cheap material
customer_reviews.text: When I took it out of the packaging, the bottom was so weak that it split off in the front. Very cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken. It also didn't look nearly as nice as it does in the picture. I thought I was getting a nice looking curio cabinet to display my miniature collection, but instead I got a poorly made and cheap looking piece. This is the last time I try buying furniture without seeing it in person first. Amazon was great though and gave me a full refund once I shipped it back.
customer_reviews.author: Abc

customer_reviews.title: Looks well built to me
customer_reviews.text: It's great for nick nacks like precious moments and stuff. I love the mirror background on it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Abrams

customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what they said it would be and looked just like the picture. 10/10 i would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This was not something I would want to display in my home. Cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: O. B. S. Sue

customer_reviews.title: ... center single door on front would make for a better view of inside and better dust prevention for
customer_reviews.text: Looked okay but was very poorly constructed back panel not squarely assembled and doors and extreme gaps at the top and center single door on front would make for a better view of inside and better dust prevention for inside
customer_reviews.author: YellowIron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A perfect product. It is built solid with real wood, mirror on the inside back reflects the light, front, sides and shelves are glass, allowing light throughout the inside. AND really keeps the dust to a minimum. Arrived quickly, well packed and easy to hang on a wall. (or just sit on a table) Looks great. Very happy with this purchase and I think you would be as well. Only problem I see is....collections seem to keep growing and this doesn't. LOL
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a wife with precious nik-naks
customer_reviews.text: My wife collecting crystal figurines, needed and beautiful wall cabinet to display her treasures. This was perfect to match her oak china cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: gatchya

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship. Left door on extreme angle so much ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor workmanship. Left door on extreme angle so much so bottom edge stuck far out from side. When closed very large gap at bottom and tight at top. Right door was missing screws in hinges. When they cut wood on left door to recess hinges they were cut to low causing the problem. I took left door off to see what could be done to correct problem. There were three sets of drill holes where they tried to relocate hinge but were unsuccessful. Pull knobs did not line up with one another. Finish on wood rough. Item is JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: William Andre

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The doors have a wide gap between them which gives you even more blocked area in front so you can't see what you want to display. For a display cabinet, it really should have a single door with full glass in front. I would not recommend buying this but you get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet came with 4 scratches on the front of the cabinet that had to be there before shipping. Very disappointing for the amount paid.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cabinet for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Te cabinet is nice. It's not great quality but for the money spent it's a good value
customer_reviews.author: Steven Van Erem

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet but the shelves don't fit into the locking ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet but the shelves don't fit into the locking mechanism. Also the wood on the bottom shelf is cracked at the back. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Just being honest.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Anything With Glass in It
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. My wife likes it; HOWEVER, it came with some of the glass broken and the wood working on the base was not done very well. The shipper did a less than acceptable job. Carton was damaged, product was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceCowBoy

customer_reviews.title: Missing shelves
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was received missing all of the glass shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Yates

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged. Wood bottom split. Doors were wedged inside. Bracket broke top of doors were marked. Back was damaged in bottom corner. I will try to fix. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Betty Maupin

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR A SMALL DISPLAY CASE
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR A SMALL DISPLAY CASE. NOT EXACTLY QUALITY WORKMANSHIP, BUT WILL WORK FINE FOR MY PURPOSE. ARRIVED QUICKLY WELL PACKAGED. WOULD HAVE LIKED THE SHELF PLACEMENT TO HAVE MORE OPTIONS.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A definite YES!
customer_reviews.text: Nice cabinet for a great price. Minimal wood framing allows more window viewing area, perfect to really showcase collectibles.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I use it too display some of my crystal. I wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mary: I love my tape amazing how it works, as far as my freeEbook I'm still looking for it. never re

customer_reviews.title: That's good stuff Maynard
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it works in my presentation of my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship could have been better, the doors hang uneven and several areas don't line up.
customer_reviews.author: MSK

customer_reviews.title: High quality cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed cabinet. It displays our turtle figurines so well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie  Charter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for my mother. They seem exactly as pictured, good quality - not great - but for the price exactly what I expected. Other reviews mentioned poor packaging. Mine came packed within a box within a box within a box, no chance for damage there! Comes with necessary hardware for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the quality of craftsmanship and grade of wood they used was not the best. There are gaps where the doors meet the ...
customer_reviews.text: They are attractive on the wall, but the quality of craftsmanship and grade of wood they used was not the best. There are gaps where the doors meet the rest of the cabinet also. The quality did not match the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Colombo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made and finish is mismatched. Not well fit together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product if you expect good quality. The curio received needed lots of work ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product if you expect good quality. The curio received needed lots of work to meet 'satisfactory'. Screws on the back of the case marked our wall when we mounted it. Touch up staining had to be done. The finish on the lower shelf shows that something was spilled on it. I have replace the shelf keys with brass keys as the cheap plastic provided did not fit properly. Not worth the $149.95 sale price.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: really nice ... but
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wall cabinet for your little treasures. However, the little plastic pegs that are supposed to hold up the glass shelves are a super poor quality ... misshapen and really unusable. Be prepared to go to the hardware store for something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mary p

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet is beautiful and was well packaged for shipping
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is beautiful and was well packaged for shipping. What I like least about it is that the doors don't meet when closed. There is at least a half to 3/4 inch gap when the doors are closed. I kept it as shipping it back would have been a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen F Calvert

customer_reviews.title: sub par craftsmanship not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a xmas present for my wife. it was embarrassing when she opened it, the quality is horrible. the base actually sags in the middle. the knobs to open the cabinet don't even line up. you cannot move the door to make them align because the hinge is so crappy and the screws so horrible it would just be broken if you tried. I bought this for $149 I am certain a freshman in high school woodshop would do a better job. Target and Walmart would have a better quality piece for half the money. I was embarrassed and should have opened it before xmas morning to inspect it..my mistake..won't happen again!!
customer_reviews.author: speakerbob

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Its very pretty but not quite the quality I was expecting, but its alright- its passable You can tell its made in China. Things aren't quite straight. I thought for the money it would be a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: my daughters favorite present from Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cabinet, and it can hold quite a bit. My 11 yr. old daughter just loves it for all her collectibles. It would definitely be a good choice for adults too. It is about what you expect for the price; we are very happy with it. Came well packaged;
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I would really like to return it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it has a large gap between the doors, I would really like to return it
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN G PERKINS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the quality for the price. Doors do not meet. Nice enough for the use I have it for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe positive reviews for this product
customer_reviews.text: If this product was half the price it might be worth purchasing. I read the other reviews and took a chance that the positive reviews were more accurate than the negative reviews. I returned the item when the negative reviews were 100% accurate. The product is of poor quality, tolerable enough to warrant a $50-70 price, but not a dime more. Regarding the "hardwood" attribute, that is a lie. The curio is constructed of cheap Chinese pine that is weaker and of lower quality than Swedish particle board. To end on a positive note, the shipping material the curio is shipped in is robust and sturdy which is very helpful when you decide to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made and the doors did not line up. I returned it for a refund. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kalziqi

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is a must for this item.
customer_reviews.text: I took pictures that I would be glad to mail you if you want to see the lack of quality in the work. I would have sent them already but had no way of knowing who would appreciate them. I requested an inspection be done before sending me the replacement curios. Didn't happen. Quality control is a must for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Billie F. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Cabinets are OK for the price, was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Cabinets are OK for the price, was a little smaller then I expected, I should have taken out a tape measure to determine size before I ordered. Actually I need 2 more cabinets to house my small car collection
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOWOWOWOWOWOW THIS IS REALLY THE BEST CASE I HAVE IT IN MY LIVING ROOM
customer_reviews.text: WOWOWOWOWOWOW THIS IS REALLY THE BEST CASE I HAVE IT IN MY LIVING ROOM. IT IS LARGE AND WILL GO ON THE WALL BUT HAVE IT ON A BOOK CASE ON THE TOP. WELL MADE TO SAY THE BEST I HAVE FOUND FOR THE ITEMS YOU WANT TO COLLECT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wall Curio Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This wall curio cabinet is made sturdy and is very attractive. I like the mirrored back to reflect my little glass animal menagerie. I also like the two glass shelves., not the usual wood shelves.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my demitasse set, and all items fit perfectly. My husband hung it with heavy duty hangers bought separately. Wish it had lights in it, but my antique set is protected yet can be viewed safely.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful hanging curio
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful hanging curio, which I purchased to put some antique toys in. When we get it up on the wall it will show them off beautifully
customer_reviews.author: photojo

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Very nice. Added a battery operated light which really enhances the crystal figurines.
customer_reviews.author: AKG_Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toscano wall curio cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived in perfect condition. Packaging was supurb. I was disappointed about the doors being a little small for the front of the cabinet leaving a 1/2 in gap when the doors were closed. I don't see any way to move them closer together as the outer edges line up with the side of the case. Other than that, it's a nice piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Maslyn

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loved it. Her Dad hung it while she was at work and we puther special figurines in it. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the fact that it can be hung. I do think there could be more hardware for hanging it more securely. We added more hardware.
customer_reviews.author: C. Basil

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet arrived promptly and was packed well. When hung on the wall it looks a little uneven...the wood does not meet up on the bottom. But it looks good hanging on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not all pegs there.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the quality of the curio was just okay. I had expected a little more quality. The doors didn't quite come together all the way. There was only enough pegs to hang two shelves instead of the three it came with. Then when I went to buy more of the shelf holder pegs, it was difficult to find ones that matched the holes. We had to kind of rig it. Then overnight the shelf fell. However, it does look nice on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lillis

customer_reviews.title: Knife Collection Cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: The display cabinet arrived in great Condition. I used for my Knife Collection.
customer_reviews.author: buyer plus

product_meta.title: Design Toscano Country Tuscan Hardwood Glass Wall Mounted Storage Curio Cabinet, Brown
product_meta.description: Color:BrownExemplifying everything that makes the country Tuscan style popular, this clean-lined, mirror-backed curio cabinet features three glass shelves and glass side panels to shed maximum light on your prized possessions. Crafted of solid hardwood, our curio cabinet boasts framed glass doors that open separately for unobstructed viewing from all three sides. With a hand-finished walnut wood tone hue to accent any decor, our curio cabinet can be mounted on the wall or set on a console or mantle. This Toscano-exclusive wall curio is perfect for your statues, enameled eggs, and other favorite collectibles. Maximum Weight Limit: 10 Pounds.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR COLLECTIBLES - With glass on three sides, add your finest heirloom figurines, statues, Faberge eggs, and prized possessions to our glass curio cabinets
WALL MOUNT OR FREESTANDING - Our wooden wall curio cabinets with hanging hardware can also stand freely as a tabletop curio cabinet cupboard
HIGH-QUALITY - Hand-crafted using hardwood with a warm walnut finish, mirrored backs, glass shelves and panels shed maximum light on your collection
DESIGN TOSCANO CURIO CABINETS - Exclusive to the Design Toscano brand, this curio cabinet provides unobstructed viewing from three sides through glass panels
Dimensions-19.5 W x 8.5 D x 26 H inches. 18 lbs. making it the perfect display cabinet!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars330 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Design Toscano Country Tuscan Hardwood Wall Curio Cabinet: Walnut Finish
